          <title>
            <string language="en">Writing for the web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben für das Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inscription pour le Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita para o Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">_ scriv per Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο για τον Ιστό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El escribir para el Web</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Why teachers need to think about how they communicate on the web.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>

          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum Lehrer denken müssen an, wie sie auf dem 
Web in Verbindung stehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi les professeurs doivent penser à la 
façon dont ils communiquent sur le Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porque os professores necessitam pensar sobre como
se comunicam no Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè gli insegnanti devono ritenere a come 
comunicano sul Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί οι δάσκαλοι πρέπει να σκεφτούν για το πώς 
επικοινωνούν στον Ιστό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Porqué los profesores necesitan pensar de cómo 
se comunican en el Web.</string>
